text: On TIKA-2158, Seva Alekseyev shared a document that contains an SdtCell that does not have an SdtContentCell.  According to the ECMA standard [1] (pdf page 3842, printed page number 3832), an SdtCell does not need to have an SdtContentCell.  We should handle the case of a non-existent SdtContentCell.
creator: tallison@mitre.org
